storyInfo: The youth named Zuo Le once again makes contact with Kroos, and confesses to the existence of Yan's Sui Regulator. He then proposes cooperation with Rhodes Island. Lee and Liang Xun drink together, and in their drunkenness, catch a glimpse of a terrifying truth.

attributes.content: Well, that was an unfruitful day...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I never had such headaches back at the agency in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Because Mr. Liang left you no leads to follow?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: No, it's actually because... I have a lot of friends in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And aside from Mr. Liang the shut-in, the only friend I have in Shangshu is you, Master Shen.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: There's a crowd at his door, isn't there?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Doesn't look like they're trying to be discreet.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hey, the Lungmenite's here too. Right... Don't be rash. Just don't let them get away.
attributes.name: Suspicious Passerby

attributes.content: Keep an eye on them.
attributes.name: Suspicious Passerby

attributes.content: Eh, I don't suppose we walked into their trap?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Weird... It doesn't matter how glorious they were in the old days, they're just a bunch of restaurateurs now. Do they really have this much influence?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: There's no one else aroundâ€”W-Wait!
attributes.name: Odd Traveler

attributes.content: M-Master Shang.
attributes.name: Suspicious Passersby

attributes.content: I'm here.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: H-Have a seat. Would you like some tea?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I asked around.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: There are a few spots that fit the description. Very few visitors, but there are some pavilions that have been around for a while. I marked them on the map.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: As for your wine shops, wherever there's a settlement, it's practically guaranteed that there's one. These places fit the bill.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: There's one at Qujiang Peak?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I have no idea myself, but Old Qian insisted that there is.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: These are all out-of-the-way trails. No normal sightseers would go there. Be careful.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I see. Thank you, Master Shang.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I will take my leave, then...
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Master Shang, do you know those men outside the door...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Don't know them.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Goodbye.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: What's going on...?
attributes.name: Suspicious Passerby

attributes.content: (Tell the innkeeper... Master Shang and the Lungmenite have dealings with each other!)
attributes.name: Suspicious Passerby

attributes.content: (Should we still block the way out here?)
attributes.name: Odd Traveler

attributes.content: (What the hell are you even trying to block? Let's go! We're out of here!)
attributes.name: Suspicious Passerby

attributes.content: You're back.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: That trip was a complete waste. Please don't ask.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm just worried about bandits coming after you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: As long as you're looking out for me, they won't make trouble.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What's more, our hot little goblet isn't in my possession anymore. You should be careful yourself.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: We found out who ambushed you. It's all a misunderstanding. They thought you were a smuggler pillaging artifacts.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Well, it sounds like Shangshu's chivalric code is alive and well. That was quite the brawl for a minor 'misunderstanding.'
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Don't blame them.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Master Shen, Lee isn't a local. I'm afraid I'll need you to take care of him for the next couple of days.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Of course, it's not big deal.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I know things are hectic at the docks lately. I'll pay you double your wage for your time.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Don't worry about it, Mr. Liang. We never talk money.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I can't do wrong by my citizens.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You've been a great help, and I might need more of your help in the future.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Fine, then... If that's how you feel, then I won't push it.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I'll stick with our boy Lee for as long as he's here. Those of us who make a living on the mountain trails and rivers know the Three Mounts and Seventeen Peaks like the backs of our hands.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: â€”Liang Xun.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: We'll talk inside.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I remember telling you that as long as you aren't hiding anything from me, this will be nothing complicated.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Tell me, what exactly is the story behind the cup and its master?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You can't tell me?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I ran into those guys again in the mountains today.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So that little 'misunderstanding' of yours isn't actually very convincing.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: How high are the stakes?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: As high as heaven.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You should've told me sooner.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I was afraid you'd get dragged into the mess if you knew too much.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So you still think I'm not part of the mess?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Forgive me.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You should get some rest. If our friend proves too difficult to locate... then you don't have to worry about it.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: We've come this far. You can't suddenly have second thoughts about this, can you?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I appreciate the feeling, but if I really call it quits here, that's the end of the good life for you. I know that much.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So what's on the table? You can at least tell me that, can't you?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Both the people and the country.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Well, the stakes do sound high, and it's such a tall tale, I'm finding that kind of hard to believe.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I would never joke about such a serious matter.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Of course I know you wouldn't.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Let me change the subject, then. You wouldn't be entertaining a lovely lady this evening, would you?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: â€”*Cough*.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: There is nothing between me and Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I never said there's anything between you two.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Your eyes said enough.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Really? Everyone always ridicules you for how unsociable you are, but even Huai Tianpei's girl is all grown up now. You have to have scored a home run at least once or twice?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You have your reasons, huh?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: How about a drink?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: It's high time we had a drink together.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Right... We're long overdue.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You truly are a swift one, Miss Kroos. The innkeeper wasn't kidding.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Where is the man with the fan?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We couldn't risk a complete wipeout in case you had any traps set up here, can we?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: How peculiar... I thought you would send him, while you hide in the shadows.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: As the saying goes, one should sacrifice a pawn to save one's queen. Not only are you the 'queen,' you're a crossbowman and an escape artist.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Even so, you came personally.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Well, my mate Nothing isn't a regular operator yet. I can't just have him fly into the face of danger.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: And yet you still have a mind for danger, especially when you have to go it alone, don't you?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: If you're the kind of bloke who goes all 'I can see right through you' just to seem smart, I'd rather go home and have a sleep.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Haha... so temperamental. Forget I said anything, then.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'll get to the point. We've looked into Rhodes Island a little. With so little time, we didn't dig up a lot of information.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I don't claim to fully know you, but at least know you can be trusted.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Can I? Not only did I butt my head into this affair, I'm an Infected, you know?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You must put the right people to the right job. Oripathy is a misfortune that all Infected face. What does that have to do with their responsibilities or skills?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I would like Rhodes Island to do us a favor.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: No, in fact, if you don't help us, then I'm afraid you'd be making an enemy of us.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You want Mr. Lee's goblet.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: When I chased the thief that night, right away, the tracks split into two. It was dark out, and you moved quick, but I never took my eyes off the one who'd actually left the Liang estate.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I lost them not long thereafter, though. And then a certain someone showed up, just like it was a planned diversionâ€”
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: The innkeeper drew my attention. Was he drawing it away from you?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: No wonder he thinks so highly of you.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Bingo, eh?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: What does the cup have to do with â€˜Sui?'
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You know of 'Sui?'
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Oh... Looks like you're not lying, though you know only half the story.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hm, is that so?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Considering you see Nian and Dusk as friends... and that she told you about this much, they must see Rhodes Island as a lifeline of sorts.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: In years past, so long as they stayed in line and broke no rules, the Sui Regulator would turn a blind eye to whatever they did.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But nowadays, things are different.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Not only are the times changing, you are on friendly terms with Nian, and you even brought Dusk off her mountain. That put you on the Sui Regulator's wrong side.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We were just...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I know you meant no ill will, but what comes next?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: How is Great Yan meant to know that they are not planning anything when they are all in one place?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: 'Great Yan...'
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I'm not trying to exaggerate.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Nian and Dusk disappeared not long after they reached Shangshu, and it just so happens that a goblet associated with them made its way here around the same time. Furthermore, the man of the hour is on Rhodes Island's side.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: This is a tremendous coincidence. Wouldn't you say so, Miss Kroos?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: And I'm not one to believe in coincidences.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Oof!
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: I forgot to hang the clothes to dry. Oh no, oh no... If I don't get to that now, there won't be anything to wear tomorrow.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Shang Zhong, huh? You shouldn't have come.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Now get lost. I'll pretend I didn't see you.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: There was a young man who asked me to look for a pavilion in the mountains.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: We all know things were complicated when you left, but not only did you leave us without an explanation, you even set the innkeeper up. Going by the rules, that makes you a traitor.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Then your men surrounded him.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Please, traitor, Brother Shang, I'm begging you. If anyone sees us, things will get hairy. Let's put a stop to this.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Who is that man?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Brother Shang!
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: I'm asking you, who is that man?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: The Lungmenite...?
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: It's all business. It's got nothing to do with outsiders, and I have nothing to tell you.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: It'll be ten full years at the end of this one. I've been thinking of giving the Association an explanation soon.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I'll give all of you an explanation.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I'll settle the score with Zheng Qingyue.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I still can't tell you, Brother Shang!
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Liu! Who pulled you out of the fire all those years ago?!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I can't say.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: It has to do with the goblet, doesn't it? The cup from ten years ago?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Youâ€”
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Bingo, then...
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: So that's the 'goblet' the kids have been talking about...
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Hey, you didn't interrogate any of the young disciples, did youâ€”
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: This must be fate...
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: â€”Hey, Shang Zhong! Don't just leave after you got that answer from me! Our years of friendship mean nothing to you, huh?! Hey!
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Hah, looks like you're a better drinker than you used to be.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The Liang Xun of the good old days would probably be curling up into a ball under the table right about now.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I drink by myself every now and then.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Well, that's our Magistrate Liang. You find the time to drink even as a government officialâ€”Hold on, you drink by yourself every now and then. That doesn't mean what I think it means, does it?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I drown my sorrows. It's human nature.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: They say that it takes a personality change to build your tolerance for alcohol. Wise words, don't you think?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's a fair point.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: *Sigh*... When we drown our sorrows, it's a whole myriad of relationship we're trying to drown.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: To tell you the truth, I was actually pretty surprised when I saw you again.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hm? Why is that?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: The Liang Xun I know is a methodical, taciturn fellow.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I remember that time in school, outside the Chamber of Teachers Emeriti, when you said you were going to bless all under heaven. You said the world's a harsh, cold place, so you'd build a fire to warm everyone up, and they would never know darkness again.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I was just spouting words. We were young. Perhaps those were the exact words that led me to reflect on myself now.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: It was years ago.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Many years ago.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You aren't the refined young master you used to be either.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Time flies, and I frittered all mine away.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's been a long time since you left home. Have you spoken to your family?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: It hasn't been that long since I left home.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're saying that detective agency in Lungmen is your home now?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What about back in Jiangdong?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Jiangdong, or Kong Tung as we call it, is just a place with a house, some lanterns, and a few old friends.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We've both changed.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I hope that when we clink our glasses together, it's not the sound of our past ambitions crumbling away that we hear.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No, no, no, that's not quite right. You're a mandarin of some standing and the magistrate responsible for a city. If the masses are happy with you, perhaps you've already achieved your dreams?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We still have a long road ahead of us. Shangshu has always been a bustling place. What I'm trying to accomplish is just gilding the lily.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I hope that you won't forget who we once were, then. Gon bui.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Gan bei.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Seems like Yan's research into occult mysticism is the greatest secret across this whole world.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You make it sound like we don't want to share.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: They may take different forms, but all nations approach the same problem in their own way. Everyone faces this issue.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Though, because of certain... historical reasons, Great Yan's Sui Regulator happens to be at the forefront of 'Feranmutology.' Always has been. Always will be.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Kjerag still worships them as gods and Sami attempts to coexist with them, but the Sui Regulator's research has advanced to unparalleled heights.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: So, the 'Sui' in Sui Regulator is the same 'Sui' that Nian talked about?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Did Nian tell you about those legends? The old emperor, the wild hunt, and what they uncovered?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: (That's the stuff Lava talked about...)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: In ancient times, the people thought of certain creatures as 'gods,' and with civilization's advancement, they gradually began to go into hiding.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The 'Sui' is one such creature.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: 'Certain creatures...?'
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Whether they actually meet the definition of a living being is up for debate, and I don't suppose we need to go there.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: All you need to know is that when at last they come to bring destruction to the world, Yan has the power to annihilate them. That's all.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Fair enough...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: This is not exactly confidential Sui Regulator information, but it's not exactly common knowledge either.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm telling you all this not because I want a scholarly discussion.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Nian, Dusk, and the one who's in hiding somewhere in Shangshu. All of them are under the Sui Regulator's surveillance.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Normally, these things would not happen at such a pace. But then one day, the clouds all dissipated from that mountain. By the time the Sui Regulator Candleholders arrived, Dusk was nowhere to be found.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: That happened just a few days ago.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: It took only a few days for the Candleholders to brief the court on this matter too.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: That's something... There's quite a bit of distance between Mount Hui-ch'i and the capital, isn't there?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is getting itself involved without knowing the whole picture. The ignorant are blameless. On the contrary, it's unimaginable that you would work with those two without knowing anything.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: And now, we would like Rhodes Island to follow the Sui Regulator's arrangement and persuade the Lungmenite to surrender the goblet himself.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I knew it... Liang Xun was under your thumb the whole time.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: He had Mr. Lee deliver the cup all the way from Lungmen to be stolen, and it's all a show, huh?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You call the magistrate by name, but gave the Lungmenite a courtesy title. That shows you are a good person.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Does being a good person mean anything else in Yan?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Please don't get the wrong idea. I'm not trying to beat around the bush. All I'm saying is that you aren't hiding your trust in the Lungmenite anymore. Is it because of his partnership with Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's actually more than that... He's a friend too.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: There aren't many people we can truly call friends. It seems Nian and Dusk are your friends too.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It sounds like the Sui Regulator has some high standing in Yan. So why the ruse? Who are you trying to fool?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I'm afraid that's more than what Rhodes Island needs to know.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: And you straight up admit that?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: There's nothing to hide. It's just a more elegant way to go about this to save our mandarins some face.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Now that I've told Rhodes Island so much, can we set aside our differences and negotiate?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You want our help?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: We'd like Mr. Lee's too.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What do you need help with?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: The elimination of the Sui.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm not drunk. No need to hold me like this.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're my guest.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I'm just a grunt you summoned from Lungmen.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I actually considered the possibility that the Messenger might not be able to find you in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: And I actually registered my agency in Lungmen hoping that you would find me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: 'Lee's Detective Agency.' Why did you choose to build your business in Lungmen, though?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: It's the farthest away I could get from Yan.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Any farther than that... I have no place to go.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You could come back.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I don't want to.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Liang Xun.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I know, actually.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You always knew.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Lungmen is not your home, yet you spent half your life holding out hope for Lungmen.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I thought, there, I could finally find what it was that I wanted to do.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Did you?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I did, but I also found that I could find it just about anywhere.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: All those years ago, Huai Tianpei said he'd study kung fu and make a name for himself.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: And all those years ago, Liang Xun wanted to do something for all people under heaven, to change the ways of the world such that they would no longer have to be afraid.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I was just a finbeast in a river, and the moment I jumped a few chi out of the water, I felt I was at the top of the world.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Okay, I'm pooped. I've got a long day ahead of me tomorrow. You should get going.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Take care.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: There's no more wine...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Old friends, old friends...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: ...A brilliant move.
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: I see that I'm losing. I suppose there is no need to continue?
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: There is no need to continue.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: There are more to the four arts than weiqi, and yet that's the one you always pick to challenge me. This is a form of bullying.
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: One man must avoid one's shortcomings.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: And we both know I am no match for you in poetry and song.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Fair.
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: Lost interest already?
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: These are times of peace.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Though these times of peace are enjoyed only by Yan.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Your stones are set only in Yan.
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: Correct. The board is entirely within Yan's borders.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Though I am not necessarily playing every round. In that case, the other games must take place elsewhere in the world too.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Will those games have aught to do with you?
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: Real men remain silent as they spectate and never regret their moves.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: So all you do is spectate. You watch mankind as they wage wars and battle with each other.
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: I'm just learning the art of the game by spectating. Even children start to play by imitating.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: But you are not him.
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You... Oh, you are one of his pieces.
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: Will you play in his stead, then? Mr. Lee of Lungmen?
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: Hoh... This is peculiar.
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: Why did he drag an ordinary man like you into this game?
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: No, perhaps he didn't choose you in particular. He simply realized that things would come to this sooner or later, no matter who and no matter what?
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm saying you are not the disheartened man, but you are sitting here in his stead, playing a game with me.
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: Who are you...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ling.
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: What is this place?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A dream... from a hundred years ago.
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: Now that's funny. How could I have a dream that takes place a whole century ago...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Indeed...
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: How could you?
attributes.name: An Indistinct Dream

attributes.content: Hmm... It feels like I had quite the dream... Oh?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Window

attributes.content: That voice...
attributes.name: Lee
